com.tversity.airflinger.sdk.android
Interface Types.IPositionInfoCallback

Enclosing class:
Types
public static interface Types.IPositionInfoCallback

Provides an interface to receive a callback after an asynchronous call to get player position info

Method Summary
 void OnReceivedInfo(java.lang.Object userData, Types.CommandResult result, java.lang.String currentTime, java.lang.String trackDuration, int currentTimeSecs, int trackDurationSecs)
          Invoked after the device returns position information
 

Method Detail

OnReceivedInfo

void OnReceivedInfo(java.lang.Object userData,
                    Types.CommandResult result,
                    java.lang.String currentTime,
                    java.lang.String trackDuration,
                    int currentTimeSecs,
                    int trackDurationSecs)
Invoked after the device returns position information

Parameters:
userData - The optional data passed to the playerGetPositionInfo function
result - The result (success/error) of playerGetPositionInfo. The result code can be one of the following:
Types.CommandResult.SUCCESS
Types.CommandResult.COMMAND_FAILED
Types.CommandResult.DEVICE_OFFLINE
Types.CommandResult.COMMAND_CANCELLED
currentTime - The current track playing position formatted as HH:MM:SS
trackDuration - The current track duration formatted as HH:MM:SS
currentTimeSecs - The current track playing position in seconds
trackDurationSecs - The current track duration in seconds
